lead_paragraph: The Bronx Trans Collective will be the city’s first major multiservice center specifically for transgender people, offering programs and services that were previously scattered across different sites.

headline.print_headline: ­For Transgender New Yorkers, a Safe Space of Their Own in the Bronx
headline.main: For Transgender New Yorkers, a Center of Their Own in the Bronx

snippet: The Bronx Trans Collective will be the city’s first major multiservice center specifically for transgender people, offering programs and services that were previously scattered across different sites.
abstract: Coalition of six Bronx-based advocacy groups, in partnership with Councilman Ritchie Torres, plans to open Bronx Trans Collective, city's first major drop-in center where transgender people can get help with medical, mental health and legal concerns.
